item.title: Random Student Generator
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

[scar]
program StudentGenerator;
var
NameMale, NameFemale, Last : Array of String;
Gender : Integer;
Procedure ArrayDeclare;
begin
NameMale := [‘Allan’, ‘Wade’, ‘Daniel’, ‘Kane’, ‘Tyler’, ‘Steven’,
‘Chris’, ‘Bo Bo’, ‘Raman’, ‘Austin’, ‘David’, ‘John’, ‘Zach’,
‘Ryan’, ‘Nick’, ‘Dan’, ‘Mike’, ‘Ian’, ‘Jessie’, ‘Timmy’, ‘Lee’];

NameFemale := [‘Lissie’, ‘Veronica’, ‘Harmony’, ‘Elizibeth’, ‘Minny’,
‘Stephany’, ‘Tiffany’, ‘Tina’, ‘Jane’, ‘Jessie’, ‘Megan’, ‘Sarah’];

Last := [‘Demuth’, ‘Gredath’, ‘Makar’, ‘Saw’, ‘Fu’, ‘Chua’, ‘Law’, ‘Swiss’,
‘Merdith’, ‘Twitin’, ‘Rekjacik’, ‘Natarajin’, ‘Smith’, ‘Oddjobb’,
‘Singsong’, ‘jakick’, ‘Dranian’, ‘Deviath’, ‘Phenton’, ‘Reqj’,
‘Upham’, ‘Baley’, ‘Coleman’, ‘Blake’, ‘Chang’, ‘Mathers’, ‘Duvall’];
end;

begin
Gender:= Random(1);
ClearDebug;
ArrayDeclare;
If(Gender = 0) Then
Writeln('First Name : ’ + NameMale[Random(GetArrayLength(NameMale))])
else
Writeln('First Name : ’ + NameFemale[Random(GetArrayLength(NameFemale))]);
Writeln('Last Name : ’ + Last[Random(GetArrayLength(Last))]);
If(Gender = 0) Then Writeln(‘Gender : Male’) Else Writeln(‘Gender : Female’);
Writeln('Weigth : ’ + IntToStr(Random(90) + 100));
Writeln(‘Heigth : ’ + IntToStr(Random(3) + 4) + ’ feet ’ + IntToStr(Random(12)) + ’ inches’);
Writeln('Room : ’ + IntToStr(Random(10) + 1));
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Random Student Generator
item.dc:creator: @The_Rs_Monkey The_Rs_Monkey
item.description:
@The_Rs_Monkey wrote:

program StudentGenerator;
var
    Name , Last : Array of String;
Procedure ArrayDeclare;
begin
  Name := ['Allan','Wade','Daniel','Kane','Tyler','Steven',
               'Chris','Lissie','Veronica','Harmony','Bo Bo','Raman',
               'Austin','David','John','Elizibeth','Zach','Minny',
               'Stephany','Tiffany','Tina','Ryan','Nick','Dan','Jane',
               'Mike','Ian','Jessie','Timmy','Megan','Sarah','Lee'];

  Last := ['Demuth','Gredath','Makar','Saw','Fu','Chua','Law','Swiss',
               'Merdith','Twitin','Rekjacik','Natarajin','Smith','Oddjobb',
               'Singsong','jakick','Dranian','Deviath','Phenton','Reqj',
               'Upham','Baley','Coleman','Blake','Chang','Mathers','Duvall'];
end;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  ArrayDeclare;
  Writeln('First Name : ' + Name[Random(20)]);
  Writeln('Last Name : ' + Last[Random(20)]);
  If Random(2) + 1 = 1 Then Writeln('Gender : Male') Else Writeln('Gender : Female');
  Writeln('Weigth   : ' + IntToStr(Random(90) + 100));
  Writeln('Heigth : ' + IntToStr(Random(3) + 4) + ' feet ' + IntToStr(Random(12)) + ' inches');
  Writeln('Room   : ' + IntToStr(Random(10) + 1));
end.

More Random And Minimzed Code.

@RdSoxFan618
Lol

Read full topic

Heres the first few I got lol

Last Name : Dranian

(and bo bo bo bo bo bo bo was soon created after lol)

First Name : Elizibeth
Last Name : Fu
Gender : Male
Weigth : 180 Lbs.
Heigth : 5 feet 4 inches
Room : 5

(last name was funny on that one lol FU and who names a boy Elizibeth?)

First Name : Veronica
Last Name : Gredath
Gender : Female
Weigth : 130 Lbs.
Heigth : 5 feet 5 inches
Room : 10

(lol the most normal one I got but thats a heavy girl lol needs to loose a few pounds. I’m 6 foot 2 and I’m only 120 lol)

item.title: Random Student Generator
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[code]program New;
type
Student = Record
Name , Last : Array[1…32] of String;
Room, Length, down : Array[1…10] of String;
Gender: Array[1…2] of String;
end;

var
Sync: Student;
x:Integer;

procedure ArrayDeclare;
begin
Sync.Name[1] := 'Allan ';
Sync.Name[2] := 'Wade ';
Sync.Name[3] := 'Daniel ';
Sync.Name[4] := 'Kane ';
Sync.Name[5] := 'Tyler ';
Sync.Name[6] := 'Steven ';
Sync.Name[7] := 'Chris ';
Sync.Name[8] := 'Lissie ';
Sync.Name[9] := 'Veronica ';
Sync.Name[10] := 'Harmony ';
Sync.Name[11] := 'Bo Bo ';
Sync.Name[12] := 'Raman ';
Sync.Name[13] := 'Austin ';
Sync.Name[14] := 'David ';
Sync.Name[15] := 'John ';
Sync.Name[16] := 'Elizibeth ';
Sync.Name[17] := 'Zach ';
Sync.Name[18] := 'Minny ';
Sync.Name[19] := 'Stephany ';
Sync.Name[20] := 'Tiffany ';
Sync.Name[21] := 'Tina ';
Sync.Name[22] := 'Ryan ';
Sync.Name[23] := 'Nick ';
Sync.Name[24] := 'Dan ';
Sync.Name[25] := 'Jane ';
Sync.Name[26] := 'Mike ';
Sync.Name[27] := 'Ian ';
Sync.Name[28] := 'Jessie ';
Sync.Name[29] := 'Timmy ';
Sync.Name[30] := 'Megan ';
Sync.Name[31] := 'Sarah ';
Sync.Name[32] := 'Lee ';

Sync.Last[1] := ‘Demuth’;
Sync.Last[2] := ‘Gredath’;
Sync.Last[3] := ‘Makar’;
Sync.Last[4] := ‘Saw’;
Sync.Last[5] := ‘Fu’;
Sync.Last[6] := ‘Chua’;
Sync.Last[7] := ‘Law’;
Sync.Last[8] := ‘Swiss’;
Sync.Last[9] := ‘Merdith’;
Sync.Last[10] := ‘Twitin’;
Sync.Last[11] := ‘Rekjacik’;
Sync.Last[12] := ‘Natarajin’;
Sync.Last[13] := ‘Smith’;
Sync.Last[14] := ‘Oddjobb’;
Sync.Last[15] := ‘Singsong’;
Sync.Last[16] := ‘jakick’;
Sync.Last[17] := ‘Dranian’;
Sync.Last[18] := ‘Deviath’;
Sync.Last[19] := ‘Phenton’;
Sync.Last[20] := ‘Reqj’;
Sync.Last[21] := ‘Upham’;
Sync.Last[22] := ‘Baley’;
Sync.Last[23] := ‘Coleman’;
Sync.Last[24] := ‘Blake’;
Sync.Last[25] := ‘Chang’;
Sync.Last[26] := ‘Mathers’;
Sync.Last[27] := ‘Duvall’;

Sync.Room[1] := ‘Room : 1’;
Sync.Room[2] := ‘Room : 2’;
Sync.Room[3] := ‘Room : 3’;
Sync.Room[4] := ‘Room : 4’;
Sync.Room[5] := ‘Room : 5’;
Sync.Room[6] := ‘Room : 6’;
Sync.Room[7] := ‘Room : 7’;
Sync.Room[8] := ‘Room : 8’;
Sync.Room[9] := ‘Room : 9’;
Sync.Room[10] := ‘Room : 10’;

Sync.down[1] := ‘100 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[2] := ‘110 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[3] := ‘120 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[4] := ‘130 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[5] := ‘140 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[6] := ‘150 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[7] := ‘160 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[8] := ‘170 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[9] := ‘180 Lbs.’;
Sync.down[10]:= ‘190 Lbs.’;

Sync.Length[1] := ‘5 feet 2 inches’;
Sync.Length[2] := ‘4 feet 9 inches’;
Sync.Length[3] := ‘6 feet 1 inches’;
Sync.Length[4] := ‘5 feet 5 inches’;
Sync.Length[5] := ‘4 feet 6 inches’;
Sync.Length[6] := ‘5 feet 7 inches’;
Sync.Length[7] := ‘5 feet 4 inches’;
Sync.Length[8] := ‘5 feet 8 inches’;
Sync.Length[9]:= ‘4 feet 4 inches’;

Sync.Gender[1] := ‘Gender : Male’;
Sync.Gender[2] := ‘Gender : Female’;

end;

begin
ClearDebug;
ArrayDeclare;
x:= Random(20)+1;
begin
Writeln('First Name : '+Sync.Name[x]);
end;
x:= Random(20)+1;
begin
Writeln('Last Name : '+Sync.Last[x]);
end;
x:= Random(2)+1;
begin
Writeln(Sync.Gender[x]);
end;
x:= Random(10)+1;
begin
Writeln('Weigth : '+Sync.down[x]);
end;
x:= Random(10)+1;
begin
Writeln('Heigth : '+Sync.Length[x]);
end;
x:= Random(10)+1;
begin
Writeln(Sync.Room[x]);
end;
end.[/code]

I added some more names and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Student Generator
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

Randomly generates a students profile:

ex.

[php]
First Name : Daniel
Last Name : Saw
Gender : Male
Weigth : 190 Lbs.
Heigth : 5 feet 2 inches
Room : 7
[/php]

[php]
First Name : Stephany
Last Name : Gredath
Gender : Female
Weigth : 190 Lbs.
Heigth : 5 feet 5 inches
Room : 8
[/php]

or my favorite:

[php]
First Name : Harmony
Last Name : Chua
Gender : Female
Weigth : 130 Lbs.
Heigth : 5 feet 4 inches
Room : 8
[/php]

Script:

[php]
program New;
type
  Student = Record
    Name , Last : Array[1..20] of String;
    Room, Length, down : Array[1..10] of String;
    Gender: Array[1..2] of String;
end;

var
  Sync: Student;
  x:Integer;
  
procedure ArrayDeclare;
begin
  Sync.Name[1]   := 'Allan ';
  Sync.Name[2]   := 'Wade ';
  Sync.Name[3]   := 'Daniel ';
  Sync.Name[4]   := 'Kane ';
  Sync.Name[5]   := 'Tyler ';
  Sync.Name[6]   := 'Steven ';
  Sync.Name[7]   := 'Chris ';
  Sync.Name[8]   := 'Lissie ';
  Sync.Name[9]   := 'Veronica ';
  Sync.Name[10]  := 'Harmony ';
  Sync.Name[11]  := 'Bo Bo ';
  Sync.Name[12]  := 'Raman ';
  Sync.Name[13]  := 'Austin ';
  Sync.Name[14]  := 'David ';
  Sync.Name[15]  := 'John ';
  Sync.Name[16]  := 'Elizibeth ';
  Sync.Name[17]  := 'Zach ';
  Sync.Name[18]  := 'Minny ';
  Sync.Name[19]  := 'Stephany ';
  Sync.Name[20]  := 'Tiffany ';
  
  Sync.Last[1]   := 'Demuth';
  Sync.Last[2]   := 'Gredath';
  Sync.Last[3]   := 'Makar';
  Sync.Last[4]   := 'Saw';
  Sync.Last[5]   := 'Fu';
  Sync.Last[6]   := 'Chua';
  Sync.Last[7]   := 'Law';
  Sync.Last[8]   := 'Swiss';
  Sync.Last[9]   := 'Merdith';
  Sync.Last[10]  := 'Twitin';
  Sync.Last[11]  := 'Rekjacik';
  Sync.Last[12]  := 'Natarajin';
  Sync.Last[13]  := 'Smith';
  Sync.Last[14]  := 'Oddjobb';
  Sync.Last[15]  := 'Singsong';
  Sync.Last[16]  := 'jakick';
  Sync.Last[17]  := 'Dranian';
  Sync.Last[18]  := 'Deviath';
  Sync.Last[19]  := 'Phenton';
  Sync.Last[20]  := 'Reqj';
  
  Sync.Room[1]   := 'Room   : 1';
  Sync.Room[2]   := 'Room   : 2';
  Sync.Room[3]   := 'Room   : 3';
  Sync.Room[4]   := 'Room   : 4';
  Sync.Room[5]   := 'Room   : 5';
  Sync.Room[6]   := 'Room   : 6';
  Sync.Room[7]   := 'Room   : 7';
  Sync.Room[8]   := 'Room   : 8';
  Sync.Room[9]   := 'Room   : 9';
  Sync.Room[10]  := 'Room   : 10';

  Sync.down[1] := '100 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[2] := '110 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[3] := '120 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[4] := '130 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[5] := '140 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[6] := '150 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[7] := '160 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[8] := '170 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[9] := '180 Lbs.';
  Sync.down[10]:= '190 Lbs.';

  Sync.Length[1] := '5 feet 2 inches';
  Sync.Length[2] := '4 feet 9 inches';
  Sync.Length[3] := '6 feet 1 inches';
  Sync.Length[4] := '5 feet 5 inches';
  Sync.Length[5] := '4 feet 6 inches';
  Sync.Length[6] := '100 feet 20 inches';
  Sync.Length[7] := '5 feet 7 inches';
  Sync.Length[8] := '5 feet 4 inches';
  Sync.Length[9] := '5 feet 8 inches';
  Sync.Length[10]:= '4 feet 4 inches';
  
  Sync.Gender[1] := 'Gender : Male';
  Sync.Gender[2] := 'Gender : Female';


end;

         

begin
  ClearDebug;
  ArrayDeclare;
  x:= Random(20)+1;
    begin
      Writeln('First Name : '+Sync.Name[x]);
    end;
  x:= Random(20)+1;
    begin
      Writeln('Last Name : '+Sync.Last[x]);
    end;
  x:= Random(2)+1;
    begin
      Writeln(Sync.Gender[x]);
    end;
  x:= Random(10)+1;
    begin
      Writeln('Weigth   : '+Sync.down[x]);
    end;
  x:= Random(10)+1;
    begin
      Writeln('Heigth : '+Sync.Length[x]);
    end;
  x:= Random(10)+1;
    begin
      Writeln(Sync.Room[x]);
    end;
end.
[/php]

I made this script to test my knowledge of Type and Record

Read full topic
